name: The Soccer Stats
author: Timo Leppänen

sections.description:
The Soccer Stats is an excellent WordPress plugin to be used with your football (soccer) team.

You may control players and matches season by season. The plugin automatically calculates stats for the players, creates match calendar list, calculates opponent statistics and so on. Page templates are available for players, matches, seasons and opponents.

Go to plugin web site for more info
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin. Activate via Plugin-settings.
  2. Ready to put some team data to the site!
sections.faq:
Website?

Please check all plugin info from the website: http://thesoccerstats.wordpress.com
sections.changelog:
1.08

  • Fix file name issue when activating

1.07

  • Norwegian language

1.06

  • Team logo possible to show in opponent page (uses featured image)
  • If you have Bootstrap already installed to your theme, it’s now possible to remove bootstrap css enqueued in theSoccerstats

1.05

  • Filtering by match type now possible in season, player and opponent template
  • Added some classes into code

1.04

  • Added match time of the day meta

1.03

  • Added flush_rewrite to activation hook

1.02

  • fix for number of opponents and match types when inserting new match
  • New feature: Possibility to auto modify all match titles

1.01

  • Fixes for PHP versions < 5.4

1.0

  • First version
